trans-unit.source: Represents a combo box on a document.
trans-unit.target: 表示文档上的组合框。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> displays a list of items that users can select.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>显示了用户可以选择的项目列表。

trans-unit.source: Users can also type their own text in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 用户还可以键入自己的文本中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: To display a drop-down list of items in a text box that users cannot edit, use a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DropDownListContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在用户无法编辑的文本框中显示项的下拉列表，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DropDownListContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: To access the list of items in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.DropDownListEntries%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问中的项列表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.DropDownListEntries%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Content Controls
trans-unit.target: 内容控件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> is one of eight types of content controls that you can use to design documents and templates in Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>是八个类型的内容控件，可以使用设计文档和 Microsoft Office Word 中的模板之一。

trans-unit.source: Content controls have a user interface (UI) that has controlled input like a form.
trans-unit.target: 内容控件具有用户界面 (UI)，具有控制类似于窗体的输入。

trans-unit.source: You can use content controls to prevent users from editing protected sections of the document or template, and you can also bind content controls to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用内容控件来防止用户编辑受保护的部分的文档或模板，并还可以将内容控件绑定到数据源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> to the beginning of the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例添加一个新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>到文档的开头。

trans-unit.source: Users can select a color name displayed by the control, or they can type the name of a new color.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择由该控件显示的颜色名称，或者它们可以键入新的颜色的名称。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddComboBoxControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddComboBoxControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Application%2A> property exposes information about the current instance of Word, the options applied to that instance, and the current documents open within the instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Application%2A>属性公开有关 Word，应用于该实例的选项的当前实例的信息以及在实例中打开当前文档。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> from the document to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 从文档复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Copy%2A> method, the original <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> remains on the document.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Copy%2A>方法时，原始<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>保留在文档。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>, including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>（包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Gets a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the control was created.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建该控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> was created in Word, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Creator%2A> property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string `MSWD`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>在 Word 中，创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Creator%2A>属性返回表示字符串的十六进制数 4d535744， `MSWD`。

trans-unit.source: This string is the four-character creator code for Word.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串是 Word 的四个字符创建者代码。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> from the document and adds it to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />，然后将其添加到剪贴板中。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Cut%2A> method, the original <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> is removed from the document.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Cut%2A>方法时，原始<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>从文档中移除。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>, including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>（包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the character style that is used to format text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 中的文本格式的字符样式的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the character style to use to format text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 中的文本格式的字符样式的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is **Default Paragraph Font**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**默认段落字体**。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items that are displayed by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 所显示的项的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControlListEntries" /> object that contains the items that are displayed by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControlListEntries" /> 对象，其中包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 显示的项。

trans-unit.source: When you add a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> to a document, it contains no items by default.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>到文档中，它不包含项目默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: To add items, use the `Add` method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.DropDownListEntries%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加项，请使用`Add`方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.DropDownListEntries%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> to the beginning of the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例添加一个新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>到文档的开头。

trans-unit.source: Users can select a color name displayed by the control, or they can type the name of a new color.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择由该控件显示的颜色名称，或者它们可以键入新的颜色的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.DropDownListEntries%2A> property to specify the color names displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.DropDownListEntries%2A>属性来指定控件显示的颜色名称。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddComboBoxControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddComboBoxControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> can be deleted from the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可从文档删除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> cannot be deleted from the document; <see langword="false" /> if the control can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果可从文档删除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果不能删除此控件，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To prevent users from editing the contents of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.LockContents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止用户编辑的内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.LockContents%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is set when the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Temporary" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Temporary" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" /> 时，设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示能否编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> cannot be edited; <see langword="false" /> if the contents of the control can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果可以编辑控件内容，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To prevent users from deleting a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> from the document, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.LockContentControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止用户删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>从文档中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.LockContentControl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> can contain line breaks.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 是否可以包含换行符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> can contain line breaks; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 可以包含换行符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的父级。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the parent of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的父级。

trans-unit.source: The parent of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> is the object in which the control is contained.
trans-unit.target: 父级<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>是控件所在的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the control is in the body of the document, this property will return a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控件在文档的正文，则此属性将返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: To get the parent of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> that is contained in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl> or a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.GroupContentControl>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.ParentContentControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 要获取其父类的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>中包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.GroupContentControl>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.ParentContentControl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent content control of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> that is nested in another content control.
trans-unit.target: 获取嵌套在另一个内容控件内的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的父内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl" /> that represents the content control in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> is nested; <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> is not nested in another content control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 嵌套在其中的内容控件；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 未嵌套在另一个内容控件中，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.GroupContentControl> controls are the only types of content controls that can contain nested content controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.RichTextContentControl>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.GroupContentControl>控件是可以包含嵌套的内容控件的内容控件的唯一类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed in the control until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.
trans-unit.target: 在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前，在控件中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder text is displayed until a user selects an item or types a new value in the control, or the control is populated with data from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 或用户选择某一项或在控件中，键入新值与数据源的数据填充控件之前，会显示的占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: To set the placeholder text to text that is in a `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock` or a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.SetPlaceholderText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置中的占位符文本`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock`或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.SetPlaceholderText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> to the beginning of the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例添加一个新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>到文档的开头。

trans-unit.source: Users can select a color name displayed by the control, or they can type the name of a new color.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择由该控件显示的颜色名称，或者它们可以键入新的颜色的名称。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.PlaceholderText%2A> property to a string that prompts the user to choose a color.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.PlaceholderText%2A>为一个字符串，将提示用户选择一种颜色的属性。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddComboBoxControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddComboBoxControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that represents the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that represents the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Range%2A> property to access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Range%2A>属性来访问控件和其他文本属性中的文本的格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range> objects, see [Word Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>对象，请参阅[Word 对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: To access only the text that is displayed in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问文本中显示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Text%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock" /> that contains the placeholder text.
trans-unit.target: 包含占位符文本的 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that contains the placeholder text.
trans-unit.target: 包含占位符文本的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder text.
trans-unit.target: 占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: Displays text that is in a <c>T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock</c>, a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />, or a string as the placeholder text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <c>T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock</c>、<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 或字符串中的文本显示为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 中的占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder text is displayed until a user edits the control, the control is populated with data from a data source, or the control's contents are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 用户编辑控件、 控件中填充数据的源的数据或者控件的内容被删除之前，会显示的占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the parameters is used when you call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.SetPlaceholderText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在调用时使用唯一的参数之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.SetPlaceholderText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If more than one parameter is specified, Microsoft Office Word uses the first specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多个参数，则 Microsoft Office Word 将使用第一个指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: If all parameters are omitted, the placeholder text is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有参数都被都省略，占位符文本是空字符串。

trans-unit.source: To get the placeholder text of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.PlaceholderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的占位符文本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.PlaceholderText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to set the placeholder text to a string.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性将占位符文本设置为一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> is currently displaying placeholder text.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 当前是否显示占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> is currently displaying placeholder text; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 当前显示占位符文本，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder text is displayed until the text in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> is changed by a user action or some other operation.
trans-unit.target: 中的文本之前会显示的占位符文本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>由用户操作或一些其他操作更改。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the placeholder text, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.PlaceholderText%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.SetPlaceholderText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取或设置占位符文本，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.PlaceholderText%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.SetPlaceholderText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that you want to associate with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 关联的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that you want to associate with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个要与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 关联的字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Tag%2A> property to store a string that is associated with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> while the document is open.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Tag%2A>属性来存储与关联的字符串<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>文档处于打开状态时。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SelectContentControlsByTag%2A> method to find a content control by its tag.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SelectContentControlsByTag%2A>方法以查找由其标记在内容控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> is automatically deleted from the document when the control is edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 时是否自动将该控件从文档中删除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> is automatically deleted when the control is edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在编辑 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 时自动将该控件删除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Temporary%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> is automatically deleted when the user types in the control, or when the text in the control is changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Temporary%2A>属性是`true`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>当用户在控件中，键入或以编程方式更改控件中的文本自动删除。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> is automatically deleted from the document, the text in the control remains in the document.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>自动从文档，该控件将保持在文档中的文本中删除。

trans-unit.source: This property is set when the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.LockContentControl" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.LockContentControl" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" /> 时，设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 中的文本。

trans-unit.source: To access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Range%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问控件和其他文本属性中的文本的格式，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.Range%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title is displayed in the border of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> when the user clicks it.
trans-unit.target: 标题显示在边框<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>当用户单击它。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLMapping" /> that represents the binding between the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> and an element in a custom XML part.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLMapping" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLMapping" /> that represents the binding between the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> and an element in a custom XML part.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLMapping" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl" /> 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.XMLMapping%2A> property to bind a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl.XMLMapping%2A>属性将绑定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>到一种 XML 中的元素 (也名为*自定义 XML 部件*) 嵌入在文档中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅[演练： 将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md)。
